short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the official Toodledo mobile interface in a popup bubble directly from the Chrome 	toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need quick access to your Toodledo task lists when working in Chrome? This extension will add a button to your Chrome toolbar that, when clicked, will open a popup bubble containing the excellent, official Toodledo mobile interface.

This extension was developed by a third party but displays the official Toodledo website for advanced mobile devices such as smartphones. Therefore you won't need to worry about entrusting your information to third parties.
